app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: Supplementary materials can be found at https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/12/5/557/s1. Figure S1: Antiviral effects of ribavirin against influenza virus PR 8 were determined in A 549 U 937 and MDCK cells; Figure S2: Correlation analysis of the TCID 50 and neuraminidase (NA) activity of influenza virus solutions produced in cell culture.
